verses.verse: קְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> Cry בְגָרוֹן֙ <S%H1627><s%> aloud אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּחְשֹׂ֔ךְ <S%H2820><s%> spare כַּשּׁוֹפָ֖ר <S%H7782><s%> like a trumpet הָרֵ֣ם <S%H7311><s%> not lift קוֹלֶ֑ךָ <S%H6963><s%> up thy voice וְהַגֵּ֤ד <S%H5046><s%> and shew לְעַמִּי֙ <S%H5971><s%> my people פִּשְׁעָ֔ם <S%H6588><s%> their transgression וּלְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> and the house יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob חַטֹּאתָֽם׃ <S%H2403><s%> their sins

וְאוֹתִ֗י <S%H853><s%> י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day יוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> day יִדְרֹשׁ֔וּן <S%H1875><s%> Yet they seek וְדַ֥עַת <S%H1847><s%> to know דְּרָכַ֖י <S%H1870><s%> my ways יֶחְפָּצ֑וּן <S%H2654><s%> and delight כְּג֞וֹי <S%H1471><s%> as a nation אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after צְדָקָ֣ה <S%H6666><s%> righteousness עָשָׂ֗ה <S%H6213><s%> that did וּמִשְׁפַּ֤ט <S%H4941><s%> not the ordinance אֱלֹהָיו֙ <S%H430><s%> of their God לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not עָזָ֔ב <S%H5800><s%> and forsook יִשְׁאָל֙וּנִי֙ <S%H7592><s%> they ask מִשְׁפְּטֵי־ <S%H4941><s%> of me the ordinances צֶ֔דֶק <S%H6664><s%> of justice קִרְבַ֥ת <S%H7132><s%> in approaching אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> to God יֶחְפָּצֽוּן׃ <S%H2654><s%> they take delight

לָ֤מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why צַּ֙מְנוּ֙ <S%H6684><s%> Wherefore have we fasted וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and thou רָאִ֔יתָ <S%H7200><s%> [say they] and thou seest עִנִּ֥ינוּ <S%H6031><s%> not? [wherefore] have we afflicted נַפְשֵׁ֖נוּ <S%H5315><s%> our soul וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no תֵדָ֑ע <S%H3045><s%> and thou takest no knowledge הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> behold בְּי֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> ? Behold in the day צֹֽמְכֶם֙ <S%H6685><s%> of your fast תִּמְצְאוּ־ <S%H4672><s%> ye find חֵ֔פֶץ <S%H2656><s%> pleasure וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עַצְּבֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H6092><s%> all your labours תִּנְגֹּֽשׂוּ׃ <S%H5065><s%> and exact

הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold לְרִ֤יב <S%H7379><s%> for strife וּמַצָּה֙ <S%H4683><s%> and debate תָּצ֔וּמוּ <S%H6684><s%> Behold ye fast וּלְהַכּ֖וֹת <S%H5221><s%> and to smite בְּאֶגְרֹ֣ף <S%H106><s%> with the fist רֶ֑שַׁע <S%H7562><s%> of wickedness לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תָצ֣וּמוּ <S%H6684><s%> ye shall not fast כַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> as [ye do this] day לְהַשְׁמִ֥יעַ <S%H8085><s%> to be heard בַּמָּר֖וֹם <S%H4791><s%> on high קוֹלְכֶֽם׃ <S%H6963><s%> to make your voice

הֲכָזֶ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> this יִֽהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> is it צ֣וֹם <S%H6685><s%> Is it such a fast אֶבְחָרֵ֔הוּ <S%H977><s%> that I have chosen י֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> ? a day עַנּ֥וֹת <S%H6031><s%> to afflict אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> for a man נַפְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H5315><s%> any הֲלָכֹ֨ף <S%H3721><s%> bow down כְּאַגְמֹ֜ן <S%H100><s%> as a bulrush רֹאשׁ֗וֹ <S%H7218><s%> his head וְשַׂ֤ק <S%H8242><s%> sackcloth וָאֵ֙פֶר֙ <S%H665><s%> and ashes יַצִּ֔יעַ <S%H3331><s%> and to spread הֲלָזֶה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this תִּקְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> [under him]? wilt thou call צ֔וֹם <S%H6685><s%> a fast וְי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day רָצ֖וֹן <S%H7522><s%> and an acceptable לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Jehovah

הֲל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not זֶה֮ <S%H2088><s%> is this צ֣וֹם <S%H6685><s%> [Is] not this the fast אֶבְחָרֵהוּ֒ <S%H977><s%> that I have chosen פַּתֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H6605><s%> ? to loose חַרְצֻבּ֣וֹת <S%H2784><s%> the bands רֶ֔שַׁע <S%H7562><s%> of wickedness הַתֵּ֖ר <S%H5425><s%> to undo אֲגֻדּ֣וֹת <S%H92><s%> burdens מוֹטָ֑ה <S%H4133><s%> the heavy וְשַׁלַּ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> go רְצוּצִים֙ <S%H7533><s%> and to let the oppressed חָפְשִׁ֔ים <S%H2670><s%> free וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every מוֹטָ֖ה <S%H4133><s%> of the yoke תְּנַתֵּֽקוּ׃ <S%H5423><s%> and that ye break

הֲל֨וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not פָרֹ֤ס <S%H6536><s%> [Is it] not to deal לָֽרָעֵב֙ <S%H7457><s%> to the hungry לַחְמֶ֔ךָ <S%H3899><s%> thy bread וַעֲנִיִּ֥ים <S%H6041><s%> the poor מְרוּדִ֖ים <S%H4788><s%> that are cast out תָּ֣בִיא <S%H935><s%> and that thou bring בָ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> the house כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When תִרְאֶ֤ה <S%H7200><s%> see עָרֹם֙ <S%H6174><s%> the naked וְכִסִּית֔וֹ <S%H3680><s%> that thou cover וּמִבְּשָׂרְךָ֖ <S%H1320><s%> body לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and not תִתְעַלָּֽם׃ <S%H5956><s%> him and that thou hide

אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> Then יִבָּקַ֤ע <S%H1234><s%> break forth כַּשַּׁ֙חַר֙ <S%H7837><s%> as the morning אוֹרֶ֔ךָ <S%H216><s%> Then shall thy light וַאֲרֻכָתְךָ֖ <S%H724><s%> and thine health מְהֵרָ֣ה <S%H4120><s%> speedily תִצְמָ֑ח <S%H6779><s%> shall spring forth וְהָלַ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> shall go לְפָנֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H6440><s%> before צִדְקֶ֔ךָ <S%H6664><s%> and thy righteousness כְּב֥וֹד <S%H3519><s%> thee the glory יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יַאַסְפֶֽךָ׃ <S%H622><s%> shall be thy rereward

אָ֤ז <S%H227><s%> Then תִּקְרָא֙ <S%H7121><s%> Then shalt thou call וַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD יַעֲנֶ֔ה <S%H6030><s%> shall answer תְּשַׁוַּ֖ע <S%H7768><s%> thou shalt cry וְיֹאמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> and he shall say הִנֵּ֑נִי <S%H2005><s%> I am' אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If תָּסִ֤יר <S%H5493><s%> Here I [am] If thou take away מִתּֽוֹכְךָ֙ <S%H8432><s%> from the midst מוֹטָ֔ה <S%H4133><s%> of thee the yoke שְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> the putting forth אֶצְבַּ֖ע <S%H676><s%> of the finger וְדַבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> and speaking אָֽוֶן׃ <S%H205><s%> vanity

וְתָפֵ֤ק <S%H6329><s%> And [if] thou draw out לָֽרָעֵב֙ <S%H7457><s%> to the hungry נַפְשֶׁ֔ךָ <S%H5315><s%> thy soul וְנֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> soul נַעֲנָ֖ה <S%H6031><s%> the afflicted תַּשְׂבִּ֑יעַ <S%H7646><s%> and satisfy וְזָרַ֤ח <S%H2224><s%> rise בַּחֹ֙שֶׁךְ֙ <S%H2822><s%> in obscurity אוֹרֶ֔ךָ <S%H216><s%> then shall thy light וַאֲפֵלָתְךָ֖ <S%H653><s%> and thy darkness כַּֽצָּהֳרָֽיִם׃ <S%H6672><s%> [be] as the noonday

וְנָחֲךָ֣ <S%H5148><s%> shall guide יְהוָה֮ <S%H3069><s%> God תָּמִיד֒ <S%H8548><s%> thee continually וְהִשְׂבִּ֤יעַ <S%H7646><s%> and satisfy בְּצַחְצָחוֹת֙ <S%H6710><s%> in drought נַפְשֶׁ֔ךָ <S%H5315><s%> thy soul וְעַצְמֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H6106><s%> thy bones יַחֲלִ֑יץ <S%H2502><s%> and make fat וְהָיִ֙יתָ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כְּגַ֣ן <S%H1588><s%> garden רָוֶ֔ה <S%H7302><s%> and thou shalt be like a watered וּכְמוֹצָ֣א <S%H4161><s%> and like a spring מַ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whose לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יְכַזְּב֖וּ <S%H3576><s%> fail מֵימָֽיו׃ <S%H4325><s%> whose waters

וּבָנ֤וּ <S%H1129><s%> And [they that shall be] of thee shall build מִמְּךָ֙ <S%H4480><s%> at חָרְב֣וֹת <S%H2723><s%> waste places עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> the old מוֹסְדֵ֥י <S%H4146><s%> the foundations דוֹר־ <S%H1755><s%> of many וָד֖וֹר <S%H1755><s%> generations תְּקוֹמֵ֑ם <S%H6965><s%> thou shalt raise up וְקֹרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> and thou shalt be called לְךָ֙ גֹּדֵ֣ר <S%H1443><s%> The repairer פֶּ֔רֶץ <S%H6556><s%> of the breach מְשֹׁבֵ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> The restorer נְתִיב֖וֹת <S%H5410><s%> of paths לָשָֽׁבֶת׃ <S%H3427><s%> to dwell in

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If תָּשִׁ֤יב <S%H7725><s%> If thou turn away מִשַּׁבָּת֙ <S%H7676><s%> from the sabbath רַגְלֶ֔ךָ <S%H7272><s%> thy foot עֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> [from] doing חֲפָצֶ֖יךָ <S%H2656><s%> thy pleasure בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day קָדְשִׁ֑י <S%H6944><s%> on my holy וְקָרָ֨אתָ <S%H7121><s%> and call לַשַּׁבָּ֜ת <S%H7676><s%> the sabbath עֹ֗נֶג <S%H6027><s%> a delight לִקְד֤וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> the holy יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מְכֻבָּ֔ד <S%H3513><s%> honourable וְכִבַּדְתּוֹ֙ <S%H3513><s%> and shalt honour מֵעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> him not doing דְּרָכֶ֔יךָ <S%H1870><s%> thine own ways מִמְּצ֥וֹא <S%H4672><s%> nor finding חֶפְצְךָ֖ <S%H2656><s%> thine own pleasure וְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> nor speaking דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> [thine own] words

אָ֗ז <S%H227><s%> Then תִּתְעַנַּג֙ <S%H6026><s%> Then shalt thou delight עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> thyself in the LORD וְהִרְכַּבְתִּ֖יךָ <S%H7392><s%> and I will cause thee to ride עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and [בָּמֹותֵי כ] (בָּ֣מֳתֵי <S%H1116><s%> height ק) אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וְהַאֲכַלְתִּ֗יךָ <S%H398><s%> and feed נַחֲלַת֙ <S%H5159><s%> thee with the heritage יַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob אָבִ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> thy father כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> For פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> for the mouth יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD דִּבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken ס
